verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, When thou lightest <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamps, <S%H5216><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> shall give light <S%H215><s%> over against <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the candlestick. <S%H4501><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> he lighted <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof over against <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the candlestick, <S%H4501><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> was of beaten <S%H4749><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the shaft <S%H3409><s%> thereof, unto <S%H5704><s%> the flowers <S%H6525><s%> thereof, was beaten work: <S%H4749><s%> according unto the pattern <S%H4758><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had showed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the candlestick. <S%H4501><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them.

And thus <S%H3541><s%> shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto them, to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them: Sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of purifying <S%H2403><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, and let them shave <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8593><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> their clothes, <S%H899><s%> and so make themselves clean. <S%H2891><s%>

Then let them take <S%H3947><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> with his meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> even fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and another <S%H8145><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> for a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and thou shalt gather <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together:

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H5130><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for an offering <S%H8573><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they may execute <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the bullocks: <S%H6499><s%> and thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

And thou shalt set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and offer <S%H5130><s%> them for an offering <S%H8573><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus shalt thou separate <S%H914><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> mine.

And after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%> shall the Levites <S%H3881><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> to do the service <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and thou shalt cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them, and offer <S%H5130><s%> them for an offering. <S%H8573><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are wholly given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5414><s%> unto me from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> instead of <S%H8478><s%> such as open <S%H6363><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> womb, <S%H7358><s%> even instead of the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%> them unto me.

For <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are mine, both man <S%H120><s%> and beast: <S%H929><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that I smote <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> them for myself.
And I have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as a gift <S%H5414><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> that there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> plague <S%H5063><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> come nigh <S%H5066><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

And Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according unto all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> concerning the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto them.

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were purified, <S%H2398><s%> and they washed <S%H3526><s%> their clothes; <S%H899><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> offered <S%H5130><s%> them as an offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> them to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them.

And after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%> went the Levites in <S%H935><s%> <S%H3881><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons: <S%H1121><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> they unto them.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is it that <S%H834><s%> belongeth unto the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> they shall go in <S%H935><s%> to wait upon <S%H6633><s%> <S%H6635><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And from the age <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they shall cease waiting upon <S%H7725><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6635><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof, and shall serve <S%H5647><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more: <S%H5750><s%>

But shall minister <S%H8334><s%> with <S%H854><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge, <S%H4931><s%> and shall do <S%H5647><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> service. <S%H5656><s%> Thus <S%H3602><s%> shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> touching their charge. <S%H4931><s%>
